item.title: Conference talks 2024
item.description: I’m looking forward to pick up speaking at conferences again. It has been a long time since Covid. Our Fuckups and What You Can Learn From It I will talk together with Andr√© Neubauer this year at Bedcon 2024 in Berlin Sep 19th - Sep 20th 2024 WJAX 2024 in Munich Nov 4th - Nov 8th 2024 We will share the most significant technical fuckups we’ve encountered across different companies during our career.
